mapper.sql: ID, BU_ID, COUNTRY_ID, COMPANY_NAME, DELETE_STATUS, IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_TIME, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFICATION_TIME, PROVINCE, PHONE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS2, ZIPCODE, TAX_ID, VERTICAL_INDUSTRY_TYPE, STATUS, SAP_ID, LOCK_REASON, EMAIL, LOCATION, MOUNTHLY_TURNOVER, PANNO_TYPE, PANNO, COMPANY_TYPE, ADDITION_BUSINESS_TYPE, SUB_BU_ID, CITY, STATE_NOTE, CITY_NOTE, SALE_GROUP, USER_GROUP, USER_GRADE, USER_AREA, REGION_ID, DISTRICT, DISTRICT_ID, SALE_CHANNEL, HANA_SAP_ID, SPECIAL_SUPPORT_TIME_START, SPECIAL_SUPPORT_TIME_END, BRANCH_COMPANY, FORCE_KYC_POPUP, ACCOUNT_DEACTIVE, ACCOUNT_DEACTIVE_INFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANY_INFO ( ID, BU_ID, COUNTRY_ID, COMPANY_NAME, DELETE_STATUS, IS_ACTIVE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_TIME, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFICATION_TIME, PROVINCE, PHONE, ADDRESS, ADDRESS2, ZIPCODE, TAX_ID, VERTICAL_INDUSTRY_TYPE, STATUS, SAP_ID, LOCK_REASON, EMAIL, LOCATION, MOUNTHLY_TURNOVER, PANNO_TYPE, PANNO, COMPANY_TYPE, ADDITION_BUSINESS_TYPE, SUB_BU_ID, CITY, STATE_NOTE, CITY_NOTE, SALE_GROUP, USER_GROUP, USER_GRADE, USER_AREA, REGION_ID, DISTRICT, DISTRICT_ID, SALE_CHANNEL, HANA_SAP_ID, SPECIAL_SUPPORT_TIME_START, SPECIAL_SUPPORT_TIME_END, BRANCH_COMPANY, FORCE_KYC_POPUP, ACCOUNT_DEACTIVE, ACCOUNT_DEACTIVE_INFO ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{buId}, #{countryId}, #{companyName}, #{deleteStatus, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{isActive, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{createdBy}, #{creationTime}, #{modifiedBy}, #{modificationTime}, #{province}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{address2}, #{zipcode}, #{taxId}, #{verticalIndustryType}, #{status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{sapId}, #{lockReason}, #{email}, #{location, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{monthlyTurnover, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{pannoType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{panno}, #{companyType}, #{additionBusinessType}, #{subBuId}, #{city}, #{stateNote}, #{cityNote}, #{saleGroup}, #{userGroup}, #{userGrade}, #{userArea}, #{regionId}, #{district}, #{districtId}, #{saleChannel, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{hanaSapId}, #{specialSupportTimeStart}, #{specialSupportTimeEnd}, #{branchCompany}, #{forceKycPopup}, #{accountDeactive, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{accountDeactiveInfo} )
mapper.select: SELECT FROM COMPANY_INFO WHERE ID = #{id} AND DELETE_STATUS != 'D'
